iana.template_text:
Name : WAP Forum Ltd.

E-mail : wap-feedback&mail.wapforum.org

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.wap.slc

Required parameters : none

Optional parameters :
charset and version

The charset parameter is the same as specified in [RFC-2046].

The version parameter indicates the version of the Service
Loading. The value has the format: <major>.<minor> - where major and
minor are integers. For example version=1.0 indicates version 1.0

Encoding considerations :
Encoding of this media type follows the same principles as specified
for the XML media types in [RFC-2376].

Security considerations :
As an XML format, Service Loading has the same security considerations
as specified in [RFC-2376].

Interoperability considerations :
The WAP Forum Ltd. Wireless Interoperability Group (WIG) assesses
interoperability for all WAP Forum Ltd. specifications. See
http://www.wapforum.org.

Published specification :
The Service Loading specification is available at
http://www.wapforum.org.


Applications which use this media :
Any that conforms to the Service Loading specification.

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) :
2. File extension(s) : .slc .wbxml
3. Macintosh file type code :
The data is Service Loading in Wireless Binary XML (WBXML) format. The
WBXML specification is available at http://www.wapforum.org.

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : WAP Forum Ltd., Wireless Application Group Chairperson
2. E-mail : wap-feedback&mail.wapforum.org

Intended usage : Common


Author/Change controller : The WAP Forum Ltd.
